ComicInfo.Summary: Part Six [Fables Are Forever]: Dorothy gloats to Cinderella about her various plots and escapes over the past several years, but it's Cinderella who gains the upper hand, pushing Dorothy to her death from a blimp over the Deadly Desert and taking the Silver Slippers for herself.
